thread.title: Fujitsu Announces Availability of PaperStream Capture Pro in U.S. Channel
thread.title_full: Fujitsu Announces Availability of PaperStream Capture Pro in U.S. Channel

author: stockhouse.com
title: Fujitsu Announces Availability of PaperStream Capture Pro in U.S. Channel
text:
SUNNYVALE, Calif. , Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Fujitsu , the market leader in document imaging scanners, today announced the availability of its advanced front-end scanning software, PaperStream Capture Pro, in the U.S. through authorized resellers, VARs, and distributors in its distribution channel. PaperStream Capture Pro helps organizations ranging from small and midsized businesses (SMBs) to large enterprises reduce costs, minimize resources and increase business efficiency within their document scanning processes.
In combination with the Fujitsu high-performance fi Series document imaging scanner line , PaperStream Capture Pro allows organizations to quickly translate paper-based data into valuable business information so they can easily manage, search for and leverage business critical content in their Enterprise Content Management (ECM) systems. It is equipped with a user friendly interface offering simple navigation and profile set-up, predefined templates and flexible data extraction options requiring minimal administrative time, streamlining the process of converting paper into high-quality images and indexed information.
The solution also offers a flexible and optimized price model, with unlimited scans per license, and the ability to operate certain phases of the document and data capture lifecycle at differing locations, in order to better optimize productivity. Additionally, PaperStream Capture Pro includes PaperStream IP , providing users with powerful, intelligent image correction, allowing documents to be automatically and easily converted into exceptionally clean images.
PaperStream Capture Pro is accompanied by the long standing and industry recognized maintenance program of Fujitsu Computer Product of America, Inc. The comprehensive, one-year support program for PaperStream Capture Pro includes 24/7 support via online, telephone and email, and ongoing software updates*.
Comments on the News
"It's important that we continually bring the latest document imaging and capture solutions to our customers," said Tod Lichner , Senior Category Manager â€“ Peripherals, Product and Partner Management, CDW. "Always being able to present the most efficient products that help them increase business efficiency and reduce costs is vital. PaperStream Capture Pro combined with Fujitsu's industry-leading scanners continues the commitment we make to our customers to provide the most comprehensive and innovative scanning technology to meet their document capture demands."
"PaperStream Capture Pro offers a simple front end capture solution that delivers a dramatic reduction of time and costs for discovery while maintaining the highest level of capture quality," said Jack Arnston , Principal, The Priton Group, LLC. "PaperStream document capture software, together with Fujitsu's robust scanner line, gives our customers a document imaging solution that alleviates complex capture processes, from the moment of capture to managing the data and storage."
Additional Supporting Resources
For more information about PaperStream Capture Pro visit:
PaperStream Capture Pro Overview and Tutorial Videos: us.fujitsu.com/fcpasolutions/capturepro Follow @FCPASolutions on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FCPASolutions Become a fan of Fujitsu Computer Products of America on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FCPASolutions Join our LinkedIn Community *One-year maintenance purchase is required for all single licenses. One-year maintenance is included in the fi-7160 Deluxe Bundle purchase price.
About Fujitsu
Fujitsu is the leading Japanese information and communication technology (ICT) company, offering a full range of technology products, solutions, and services. Approximately 159,000 Fujitsu people support customers in more than 100 countries. We use our experience and the power of ICT to shape the future of society with our customers. Fujitsu Limited (TSE: 6702) reported consolidated revenues of 4.8 trillion yen ( US$40 billion ) for the fiscal year ended March 31, 2015 . For more information, please see http://www.fujitsu.com .
About Fujitsu Computer Products of America, Inc.
Fujitsu Computer Products of America, Inc. is an established leader in the Document Imaging industry, delivering innovative scanning solutions and services that enable our customers to solve critical business productivity issues and streamline operations. Fujitsu provides cutting-edge document capture solutions for business and personal environments, backed by a comprehensive portfolio of service and support programs. For more information about Fujitsu Document Imaging solutions and services, visit http://us.fujitsu.com/fcpa or call us at 800-626-4686.
